document_data.name: Plesiosaurus
document_data.mainbody: A '''plesiosaurus''' ({{Pronounce|ples|ee|o|SAR|us|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) was an aquatic carnivorous [[dinosaur]].
document_data.Description: Plesiosauruses had compact bodies and strong flippers that were used to swim. They had long and flexible necks that accounted for about a third of their length.
document_data.Behavior: Plesiosauruses were aggressive predators. They attacked any creature that crossed their path. They were also highly curious and considered to be one of the smartest species of dinosaurs.

Ecology.Habitats:
Plesiosaurs were commonly found in the depths of the [[Lake of Mists]] and some dwelled in the [[Methmere]].<ref>

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some lived within the central lake of the [[Forbidden Plateau (divine realm)|Forbidden Plateau]].
